select d.id, d.name, d.device_number as deviceNumber, d.status, d.remark, d.imgs, d.product_type_id as productTypeId, d.product_type_show AS productTypeShow, d.create_time as createTime, d.update_time as updateTime, d.creator_name as creatorName, d.updater_name as updaterName from device_item d where d.deleted = 0
and d.name like concat('%',#{query.name},'%')
and FIND_IN_SET(#{query.groupId}, d.product_type_show) > 0

select d.id, d.name, d.imgs, d.device_number as deviceNumber, d.status, d.remark, t.label AS productTypeName, d.create_time as createTime, d.creator_name as creatorName from device_item d LEFT JOIN device_product_type t ON d.product_type_id = t.id LEFT JOIN device_item_group g ON g.device_item_id = d.id WHERE d.deleted = 0 AND (g.device_group_id IS NULL OR g.device_group_id != #{groupId})
and d.name like concat('%', #{deviceName}, '%')

select d.id, d.name, d.imgs, d.device_number as deviceNumber, d.status, d.remark, t.label AS productTypeName, d.create_time as createTime, d.creator_name as creatorName from device_item d LEFT JOIN device_product_type t ON d.product_type_id = t.id LEFT JOIN device_item_group g ON g.device_item_id = d.id WHERE d.deleted = 0
and g.device_group_id = #{query.groupId}
